name: Norm Felker
bio: The 'Verse! needed a comic book expert, so we grabbed the Random White Guy from a local comic shop. Luckily, Norm has played enough Star Fox and watched The Last Star Fighter a thousand times to be useful as a pilot as well.
likesDislikes: Likes: Video Games, Dad Jokes Dislikes: Mullets, Most things from the 80s

name: Emilia Yu
bio: Emilia is a talented engineer with a knack for robotics. She's always tinkering with gadgets and loves to explore new planets.
favoriteNovel: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

name: Lucas Longacre
bio: Lucas is a die-hard sci-fi fan with a love for all things space-related. He's always ready with a movie quote or a clever engineering solution. In his former career he was a documentary filmmaker and travled the world. Now he gets to travel the stars.

name: Bridget Brogan
bio: Bridget is the ship's communications officer and resident linguist. She enjoys deciphering alien languages and making first contact with new species.

name: The Mysterious Prusakowski
bio: Kronsworth is the ship's resident scientist and astrophysicist. He spends his time studying cosmic phenomena and searching for signs of extraterrestrial life.
